divs: Sighting DetailsI recently seen something on the history channel and the discription of a UFO that was given was identical to one I witnessed back in o7 or 08 not quite sure. It was between 8 or 9 and dark already. I was going out to turn the water off in the garden and close the shed door. I just looked up there it was. It came from the N-E (the direction of our local airport) and continued on to the s-w. Once it was right over head you could tell the thing was F^%#@*g massive. I guess like holding a opened up newspaper at arms lenghth while looking up. It was big!!! The triangle had 5 red lights and then there was a single red light following like flying wing. this one had no body or nothing just a red light.I ran to the patio to get my grandfather "Papa Papa come check this out" he walked out with me looked up and said "yep" then went back in. I laughed my ass off. It moved around the same speed as a blimp. no sound at all until it was a ways off then just a low hum. I never reported it just told friends. If I was to call the police here there so narrow minded to them it would be gang related. LOL. Any way thats it. it was visable round 5 mins or so then it got out of my sight due to trees and houses. I would like to to know were there any reportings of this around the dates of my sighting? I would be interested to know if any one else seen it too.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around August 14th 2008
Summary: Large triangle w/ 5 red lights and single red light following
